org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.cif

Class CifFileConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.cif.CifFileConverter

  • public class CifFileConverter
extends Object
    Convert BioJava structures to CifFiles and vice versa.
    Since:
    5.3.0
    Author:
    Sebastian Bittrich
